def modify_features(df_input) -> pd.DataFrame:
    """
    Thought 1: Counting the occurrences of each unique value in the Weight column can provide insights into the distribution and frequency of crab weights.
    New Feature 1: weight_counts | weight_counts = df['Weight'].value_counts()
    """
    import pandas as pd
    import numpy as np
    """
    Thought 1: Taking the square root of the Length feature can help normalize the data distribution and highlight any non-linear relationships with the target variable (age).
    New Feature 1: sqrt_length | sqrt_length = df['Length'].apply(np.sqrt)
    
    Thought 2: Finding the residual of Height and Diameter can reveal any specific patterns or relationships between these two features.
    New Feature 2: height_residual_diameter | height_residual_diameter = df['Height'] - df['Diameter']
    """
    df_output = df_input.copy()
    
    # Feature 1: Taking the square root of the Length feature
    df_output['sqrt_length'] = df_input['Length'].apply(np.sqrt)
    
    # Feature 2: Finding the residual of Height and Diameter
    df_output['height_residual_diameter'] = df_input['Height'] - df_input['Diameter']

    return df_output
